name: Linear / Quadratic Equation Solver. Step-by-Step
description: An app for solve linear equations / simultaneous equations & quadratic equations quickly. Use any number of variables and calculate answers of unknown variables of linear equations. Also you can use this for reduce/simplify equations Step by Step. You can draw a graph for single or many linear equations..  Example (Linear) :  2(5a+b/3) = 4*3(10a/5-1)+3b --- (1) (3b - 2a)*0.5 - 2(a+b/2)= 0 --- (2)  Automatically reduce to :  (1) ---> -14a -7/3b + 12 =0 (2) ---> -3a+1/2b=0  And answer will be:  a = 3/7 = 0.4285714285714286 b = 18/7 = 2.571428571428571  Quadratic Equation: Enter ax^2+bx+c type equation  Get answer This use quadratic equation solving formula for calculating. You can get steps of simplification  Available input methods :  SMART-KEYBOARD DEFAULT KEYBORD COPY-PASTE  Digits / Decimal numbers, any letters , +,- ,*, / signs are valid. Also you can use brackets ().  Do not use other signs  * make sure your input is correct, if not you will get error or wrong answer.  HIGHLIGHTS --------------------- * Easy and quickly solve * Automatically detect variables from your text input * Step by Step Reducing available  * Graphs for Linear equations * Automatic simplify equation Ex: 10x/2+4*2y-8=2x+3y-z+2 --->3x+5y+z=10 * Easy Quadratic Solver * Trace errors and find your input mistake quickly * Any number of variables  * Input with your default style (Default keyboard) or Smart Style * See screenshots for more.....
